name: Tinyproxy
desc: Light-weight HTTP/HTTPS proxy daemon for POSIX operating systems

options.name: settings
options.type: attribute set of (atom (null, bool, int, float or string) or a list of them for duplicate keys)

options.name: settings.Anonymous
options.desc: If an  Anonymous  keyword is present, then anonymousproxying is enabled. The headers listed with  Anonymous  areallowed through, while all others are denied. If no Anonymous keyword ispresent, then all headers are allowed through. You must include quotesaround the headers.

options.name: settings.Filter
options.desc: Tinyproxy supports filtering of web sites based on URLs or domains.This option specifies the location of the file containing the filterrules, one rule per line.

options.name: settings.Listen
options.desc: Specify which address to listen to.

options.name: settings.Port
options.desc: Specify which port to listen to.
